text: Peru women's national handball team is the team that represents Peru in international handball competitions and is governed by the Federacion Deportiva Peruana de Handball. ==Tournament history== ===Pan American Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- |style="border: 3px solid red" align=left| 2019 Lima |7th place match |8th |5 |0 |0 |5 |60 |201 |} ===South American Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | 2018 Cochabamba |Consolation round |6th |4 |1 |0 |3 |79 |128 |} ===Bolivarian Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | 2017 Santa Marta |Round Robin |5th |5 |1 |0 |4 |74 |218 |} ==Current Squad== The squad chosen for the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru. Head coach: Mario Ramos ==References== ==External links== *IHF profile Handball Category:Women's national handball teams National team
title: Peru women's national handball team
